Quickstart

CodeÂ¶

ros-cmake is in the ‘ros-cmake’ repository at https://github.com/straszheim/ros-cmake. The git clone url is git://github.com/straszheim/ros-cmake.git. Don’t run off and clone it yet; use the quickstart. But dont do this yet, follow the directions below.

  • Quickstart
    • Setup build environment
    • Modify buildspace
    • Generate CMakeLists.txt and run cmake
    • Build
    • Use
    • Install
    • Use
  • High level view/rationale
  • Notes
    • Build detritus
    • Code Generators
    • Subshelling and environment variables
